messages.zh: 第三关（前）
messages.en: level 3(pre)

messages.zh: 远处那个，是不是......
messages.en: Over there in the distance, is that……

messages.zh: ......是ace的小队吗？
messages.en: ……Is it ace’s squad?

messages.zh: 头儿，你怎么在这？
messages.en: Boss, why are you here?

messages.zh: 我担心你们遭到整合运动封锁，所以赶来支援。
messages.en: I was afraid that you were held off by Reunion Movement, so I came to help.

messages.zh: 你来了？
messages.en: You’re here?

messages.zh: 杜宾。
messages.en: Dobermann.

messages.zh: 临光那边，不要紧？
messages.en: Is Nearl okay over there?

messages.zh: 现在还没有能难倒她的事。
messages.en: There's nothing to stump her yet.

messages.zh: 而且，和我想的一样，你们遇到麻烦了。
messages.en: And, just as I thought, you’re in trouble.

messages.zh: 是的。整合运动发动了突然袭击。
messages.en: Yes. Reunion Movement launched a sudden attack.

messages.zh: 我们那边也是。幸亏临光指挥得当，省了许多功夫。
messages.en: Same for us here. Thanks to Nearl’s commanding, that saved us a lot of effort.
Well then……urghh……!

messages.zh: 你受伤了？让我来处理......
messages.en: You’re hurt? Let me treat it……

messages.zh: 麻烦你了......
messages.en: My apologies……

messages.zh: 都怪切城那个感染者诊所，叫什么......阿撒兹勒。
messages.en: It’s all that Infected clinic in Chernobog, called something like……Azazel.

messages.zh: 如果他们当时肯分享情报，或者愿意合作的话......
messages.en: If they were willing to share information, or cooperate……

messages.zh: 我们就不会陷入如此被动的境地了！
messages.en: We wouldn’t be in such a passive condition now!

messages.zh: 也不全是这样......
messages.en: That’s not it……

messages.zh: 阿米娅，当时和他们交涉时你也在场吧？
messages.en: Amiya, you were there too when we negotiated with them right?

messages.zh: 他们那傲慢冷漠的态度，我真是......
messages.en: That arrogant and cold attitude of theirs, I’m just……

messages.zh: 气不打一处来！
messages.en: so pissed off at them!

messages.zh: 不能怪罪他们。
messages.en: We can’t blame them.

messages.zh: 头儿也这么说......
messages.en: Boss says this too……

messages.zh: 感染者本就很难相信别人。
messages.en: The Infected are untrusting to begin with.

messages.zh: 经历那么多苦难......当然会变得保守与顽固。
messages.en: After so many suffering……of course they’d become guarded and stubborn.

messages.zh: 因为不提防他人，就会被他人伤害。
messages.en: Because not being on guard constantly is likely to get them hurt.

messages.zh: 就连感染者都没法互相信任。
messages.en: Even the Infected can’t trust each other.

messages.zh: 在这片土地上，哪怕只是想依偎取暖、独善其身......都很困难。
messages.en: On this land, whether you want to huddle for warmth or stay by yourself……they’re all very difficult.

messages.zh: 至少他们那样做......我能理解，也能原谅。
messages.en: At least their actions……I can understand, and can forgive too.

messages.zh: 像罗德岛这样不分彼此，或是整合运动那样狂热的排外拥内，都很少见。
messages.en: Infected united like Rhodes Island, or the extremely xenophobic Reunion Movement, are both hard to see.

messages.zh: 杜宾教官。
messages.en: Instructor Dobermann.

messages.zh: 我能理解你的怒气......也能理解那个小诊所的苦衷。
messages.en: I can understand your anger……and I can understand the hardship of that clinic as well.

messages.zh: 任何人都无法逃离这漩涡，想必他们也面临着种种难题。
messages.en: Nobody can escape from this whirlpool, they must have their difficulties as well.

messages.zh: 但在解决其他人的难题前——
messages.en: But before solving others’ difficulties——

messages.zh: 我们先要解决自己的。
messages.en: We must solve our own first.

messages.zh: 七点钟方向，整合运动巡逻小队。动作快！
messages.en: Seven o’clock, Reunion Movement patrols. Move!

messages.zh: 敌人！戒备！
messages.en: Enemies! On your guards!
